0.title: Setup
0.body:
[b][i]CONTENTS[/b]:[/i]

- 60-card deck containing 10 copies of the 6 unique face cards
- 4 additional face cards
- Face value token with a reversible side adding the 4 additional face cards
- 3 colored coin pouches with increasing values
- Custom made info graphic, with a blank table sprite on the reverse side
- Casino music in Music player

[b][i]SETUP[/b]:[/i]

Up to 6 players can play in a standard game, one for each unique face card in the deck. In the event of more players, you must add at least [b]one additonal suit of 10 cards[/b] per additional player and shuffle them into the deck.

12.title: Rules
12.body:
[b][i]TABLETOP RULES[/b][/i]

The player in the Green position (or closest to the Green position's left) is the Dealer first. The Dealer gives all players 5 cards, with the player to their left being dealt first.
The Dealer must keep their cards face-down until their turn. They also cannot bet Coins.

On your turn, you may discard and redraw up to 5 cards to get a better hand. If you think your hand will be better than the Dealer's, additional Coins may be bet; up to 5 Coins per bet.

Play continues to the next player until the Dealer plays last, who flips their cards over before starting their turn.

Players with a better hand than the Dealer gain Coins back, while losing players lose their bet Coins to the Dealer.

In the event of the same hand being shown between a player and the Dealer, the most occurring symbol of the highest value wins.
From worst to best:
1. Cloud
2. Mushroom
3. Flower
4. Luigi
5. Mario
6. Star
In the event of the same value symbol, the player reclaims their bet Coins.

Play continues for 2 Dealer rotations, going clockwise. Whoever has the most Coins at the end wins!

---

[b][i]HAND MULTIPLIER[/b][/i]

When a player wins against the Dealer, the amount of Coins they bet are multiplied then given back. The multiplier is dependant on what hand they won with.
[i]*This effect does not apply to the Dealer, whom only gains Coins from losing players.[/i]

16x- 5 of a Kind
8x - 4 of a Kind
6x - Full House
4x - 3 of a Kind
3x - 2 Pairs
2x - 1 Pair

---

[b][i]EXTRA CARDS[/b][/i]

If you want a change in appearance, or if you want to add more variables for added challenge, you may duplicate the 4 additional cards and shuffle them into the deck.
From worst to best:
1. Cloud
2. Goomba
3. Mushroom
4. Yoshi
5. Flower
6. Boo
7. Luigi
8. Bowser
9. Mario
10. Star

13.title: Credits
13.body:

All sprites from Super Mario 64 DS and New Super Mario Bros. created by Nintendo c 2004

LuaScript:
local startingCoins = 10
local copiesOfEachCard = 5

local tagForCards = "Poker card"
local bagGUID = "a0ed74"
local luigiGUID = "3d45b3"
local turnGUID = "752e64"
local tableGUID = "a1b071"
-- TODO: player's object

local bagObject
local luigiObject
local turnObject
local tableObject
local discardCount = 0
-- local xml = self.UI.getXml()
-- local discardButton = UI.getAttribute(xml, "Discard")
--[[ Lua code. See documentation: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/ --]]

function getAllObjects()
    bagObject = getObjectFromGUID(bagGUID)
    luigiObject = getObjectFromGUID(luigiGUID)
    turnObject = getObjectFromGUID(turnGUID)
    tableObject = getObjectFromGUID(tableGUID)

    local params = {
        startingCoins = startingCoins,
        tableObject = tableObject,
        copiesOfEachCard = copiesOfEachCard,
    }
    turnObject.call("setVariables", bagGUID)
    bagObject.call("setVariables", params)
end

function onLoad()
    getAllObjects() 
    --xml = self.UI.getXml()
    --discardButton = UI.getAttribute(xml, "Discard")
    --self.UI.Hide("Discard")
end

-- function onUpdate()
--     -- turnObject.call("turn")
--     -- Player's turn
--     -- Luigi's turn
-- end

function startButton()
    tableObject.call("deleteAllCards", tagForCards)
    tableObject.call("deleteAllCoins")
    bagObject.call("buildDeck")
    tableObject.call("giveCoinsToAll", startingCoins)
    bagObject.call("dealFiveToSeatedPlayers")
    --self.UI.show("Discard")
    visibilityToAllSeatedColors()
end

function nextTurn()
    tableObject.call("deleteAllCards", tagForCards)
    bagObject.call("buildDeck")
    bagObject.call("dealFiveToSeatedPlayers")
    visibilityToAllSeatedColors()
end

function discard(player_clicker)
    hideVisibilityForColor(player_clicker.color)
    discardCount = discardCount + 1
    bagObject.call("fillHandOfPlayer", player_clicker)

    if(discardCount == #getSeatedPlayers()) then
        bagObject.call("dealToLuigi")
        discardCount = 0
    end
end

function visibilityToAllSeatedColors()
    local visibility = ""
    for _, playerColor in ipairs(getSeatedPlayers()) do
        visibility = visibility .. "|" .. playerColor
    end
    UI.setAttribute("Discard", "visibility", visibility)
end

function hideVisibilityForColor(playerColor)
    local currentVisibility = self.UI.getAttribute("Discard", "visibility")
    local colors = currentVisibility:split("|")
    local newVisibility = ""

    for _, color in ipairs(colors) do
        if color ~= playerColor then
            if newVisibility ~= "" then
                newVisibility = newVisibility .. "|"
            end
            newVisibility = newVisibility .. color
        end
    end
    if(newVisibility == "") then
        newVisibility = "0"
    end
    UI.setAttribute("Discard", "visibility", newVisibility)
end

function string:split(delimiter)
    local result = { }
    local from  = 1
    local delim_from, delim_to = string.find( self, delimiter, from  )
    while delim_from do
      table.insert( result, string.sub( self, from , delim_from-1 ) )
      from  = delim_to + 1
      delim_from, delim_to = string.find( self, delimiter, from  )
    end
    table.insert( result, string.sub( self, from  ) )
    return result
end

</Defaults>

rectAlignment="Center" >

local bagObject

function setVariables(bagGUID)
    bagObject = getObjectFromGUID(bagGUID)
end

function turn()
    bagObject.call("draw")
    self.call("waitForDiscards")
    self.call("waitForBets")
    -- Luigi's turn
    self.call("exchangeMoney")
    
    self.call("lose")
    -- if Luigi.loses then
    self.call("win")
    -- end
end

function waitForDiscards()
end

function waitForBets()
end

function exchangeMoney()
end

function win()
    --ui with restart button
end

function lose()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Card
Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local copiesOfEachCard = 5
local positionCardClonedOffsetZ = -4

local deckObject = {}
local tableObject = {}
local maxHand = 5
local luigisHandPositions = {}
local luigisHand = {}

local handScriptingZone = getObjectFromGUID("eb8c4f")

function setVariables(params)
    tableObject = params.tableObject
    copiesOfEachCard = params.copiesOfEachCard
    self.call("setLuigisHandPositions")
end
local copiesOfEachCard = 5
local positionCardClonedOffsetZ = -4

local deckObject = {}
local tableObject = {}
local maxHand = 5
local luigisHandPositions = {}
local luigisHand = {}
local deckBagObject = getObjectFromGUID("12fcbd")

local handScriptingZone = getObjectFromGUID("eb8c4f")

function setVariables(params)
    tableObject = params.tableObject
    copiesOfEachCard = params.copiesOfEachCard
    self.call("setLuigisHandPositions")
end

function buildDeck()
    deckObject = nil
    local positionCardCloned = self.getPosition()

    for _, card in ipairs(self.getObjects()) do
        
        local cardObject = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid})
        for i = 1, copiesOfEachCard do
            local cardClone = cardObject.clone()
            deckBagObject.putObject(cardClone)
        end
        self.putObject(cardObject)
    end
end

function draw()
    if (deckObject == nil) then
        deckObject = getDeckObject()
    end
    local card = deckObject.takeObject()
end

function onObjectSpawn(object)
    local deckSize = copiesOfEachCard * #self.getObjects()
    print(object.name .. #object.getObjects())
    if(object.name == "Deck") then
        if(#object.getObjects() == deckSize) then
            deckObject = object
        end
    end
end

function getDeckObject()
    local positionDeck = self.getPosition()
    positionDeck.z = positionDeck.z + positionCardClonedOffsetZ

    for _, object in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do        
        local tolerance = 1
        
        if  math.abs(object.getPosition().x - positionDeck.x) < tolerance and
            math.abs(object.getPosition().y - positionDeck.y) < tolerance and
            math.abs(object.getPosition().z - positionDeck.z) < tolerance 
        then
            return object
        end
    end

    Wait.frames(1)
    return 
end


function dealToLuigi()
    for _, position in ipairs(luigisHandPositions) do
        deckObject.takeObject({
            position = position,
        })
    end
end

function dealFiveToSeatedPlayers()
    function waitForDeckObject()
        while deckObject == nil do
            coroutine.yield(0)
        end
        for _,playerColor in ipairs(getSeatedPlayers()) do
            deckObject.deal(maxHand, playerColor)
        end
        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "waitForDeckObject")
end

function fillHandOfPlayer(player)
    local handsCount = #player.getHandObjects(1)
    local cardsToDeal = maxHand - handsCount
    deckObject.deal(cardsToDeal, player.color)
end

function setLuigisHandPositions()
    for _, snapPoint in ipairs(Global.getSnapPoints()) do
        if(snapPoint.tags[1] == "Luigis hand") then
            table.insert(luigisHandPositions, snapPoint.position)
        end
    end
end

function setLuigisHand()
    local listOfCards = {}

    for _, object in ipairs(Global.getObjects()) do
        if(#listOfCards < maxHand) then
            if(self.call("isObjectInLuigisHand",object)) then
                table.insert(listOfCards, object)
            end
        end
    end

    self.luigisHand = listOfCards
end

function isObjectInLuigisHand(object)
    for _, position in ipairs(luigisHandPositions) do
        if(object.position == position) then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

function getLuigisHand()
    if(#self.luigisHand == 0) then
        self.call("setLuigisHand")
    end

    return self.luigisHand
end
function buildDeck()
    deckObject = nil
    local cards = self.getObjects()
    local positionCardCloned = self.getPosition()
    positionCardCloned.z = positionCardCloned.z + positionCardClonedOffsetZ

    for _, card in ipairs(cards) do
        
        local cardObject = self.takeObject({guid = card.guid})
        local params = {
            object = cardObject, 
            numberOfObjects = copiesOfEachCard, 
            positionToSpawn = positionCardCloned,
        }
        tableObject.call("stackObjects", params)

        self.putObject(cardObject)
    end
end

function draw()
    if (deckObject == nil) then
        deckObject = getDeckObject()
    end
    local card = deckObject.takeObject()
end

function onObjectSpawn(object)
    local deckSize = copiesOfEachCard * #self.getObjects()
    print(object.name .. #object.getObjects())
    if(object.name == "Deck") then
        if(#object.getObjects() == deckSize) then
            deckObject = object
        end
    end
end

function getDeckObject()
    local positionDeck = self.getPosition()
    positionDeck.z = positionDeck.z + positionCardClonedOffsetZ

    for _, object in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do        
        local tolerance = 1
        
        if  math.abs(object.getPosition().x - positionDeck.x) < tolerance and
            math.abs(object.getPosition().y - positionDeck.y) < tolerance and
            math.abs(object.getPosition().z - positionDeck.z) < tolerance 
        then
            return object
        end
    end

    Wait.frames(1)
    return 
end


function dealToLuigi()
    for _, position in ipairs(luigisHandPositions) do
        deckObject.takeObject({
            position = position,
        })
    end
end

function dealFiveToSeatedPlayers()
    function waitForDeckObject()
        while deckObject == nil do
            coroutine.yield(0)
        end
        for _,playerColor in ipairs(getSeatedPlayers()) do
            deckObject.deal(maxHand, playerColor)
        end
        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "waitForDeckObject")
end

function fillHandOfPlayer(player)
    local handsCount = #player.getHandObjects(1)
    local cardsToDeal = maxHand - handsCount
    deckObject.deal(cardsToDeal, player.color)
end

function setLuigisHandPositions()
    for _, snapPoint in ipairs(Global.getSnapPoints()) do
        if(snapPoint.tags[1] == "Luigis hand") then
            table.insert(luigisHandPositions, snapPoint.position)
        end
    end
end

function setLuigisHand()
    local listOfCards = {}

    for _, object in ipairs(Global.getObjects()) do
        if(#listOfCards < maxHand) then
            if(self.call("isObjectInLuigisHand",object)) then
                table.insert(listOfCards, object)
            end
        end
    end

    self.luigisHand = listOfCards
end

function isObjectInLuigisHand(object)
    for _, position in ipairs(luigisHandPositions) do
        if(object.position == position) then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

function getLuigisHand()
    if(#self.luigisHand == 0) then
        self.call("setLuigisHand")
    end

    return self.luigisHand
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
-- TODO: local coinsBuckets
local oneCoinBag = getObjectFromGUID("49a549")

function deleteAllCards(tag)
    for _, object in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if object.hasTag(tag) or object.tag == "Deck" then
            object.destroy()
        end
    end
end

function deleteAllCoins()
    for _, object in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
        if( string.match(object.getName(), "^x.*Coin$")
        ) then
            object.destroy()
        end
    end
end

function giveCoinsToAll(number)
    for _, player in ipairs(Player.getPlayers()) do
        giveCoinsToPlayer(player.color, number)
    end
end

function giveCoinsToPlayer(playerColor, numberOfCoins)
    local bucketTag = playerColor .. " coins bucket"
    
    for _, object in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
        
        if object.getName() == bucketTag then
            for i = 1, numberOfCoins do
                local coin = oneCoinBag.takeObject()
                coin.setPosition(object.getPosition())
            end             
        end

    end
end
    
function stackObjects(params)
    function coinside()
        waitFrames(1)
        for i = 1, params.numberOfObjects do
            params.positionToSpawn.y = params.positionToSpawn.y + 0
            local objectCloned = params.object.clone({
                position = params.positionToSpawn
            })
        end
        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coinside")
end

function waitFrames(frames) 
    while frames > 0 do 
        coroutine.yield(0)
        frames = frames - 1 
    end
end
